thread.title: Lens Flare in an Image Looks Just Like Eric Cartman From South Park
thread.title_full: Lens Flare in an Image Looks Just Like Eric Cartman From South Park

author: Justin Page
title: Lens Flare in an Image Looks Just Like Eric Cartman From South Park
text:
Redditor Edders_19 has shared an image of the Bromley, England skyline featuring a lens flare that looks just like Eric Cartman from South Park . Edders_19’s screenshot was taken from The SPORT Bible ‘s promotional video posted on Facebook for the Discovery UK documentary series, Idris Elba: Fighter .
via reddit 
Related Laughing Squid Posts Rush Uses Clip of ‘South Park’ Characters Trying to Play ‘Tom Sawyer’ As a Live Intro to Their Song The History and Science Behind Lens Flares and How They Are Used in Movies A Knit Hat That Looks Like a Roasted Turkey
